short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your internet vices, zone in on what's important.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps create a less distracting environment by selecting the sites you find distract you the most and add an extra layer of resistance when going off track.
